content: in this legal case a court in viru county issued a final resolution on 30012023 the case involved two parties nk and ak who were seeking a divorce the court decided to divide their joint assets as follows nk will keep a car worth 2500 euros and ak will compensate nk with 1250 euros nk will also be recognized as the sole owner of an apartment ak is required to change the owners entry in the land register to reflect nk as the sole owner the costs of the proceedings will be shared by both parties ak has the option to appeal the courts decision within 30 days the court also mentioned previous cases related to the division of joint assets and the determination of separate assets the court ruled that the apartment in question should be considered joint assets and divided according to the family law act the court also ordered ak to provide a statement of intent to change the owners entry in the land register the court determined that the procedural costs of the case should be borne by both parties
